channel.title: How to add drops
channel.description:
Ive searched forums in and out all over to find a tut about how to add drops to monsters. I cant find any, im not requesting a tut, im just asking forsome one to help me or teach me how to. Help is appreciated.
Thanks

item.title: How to add drops
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:

[quote=“Danny15, post:1, topic:48689”]Ive searched forums in and out all over to find a tut about how to add drops to monsters. I cant find any, im not requesting a tut, im just asking forsome one to help me or teach me how to. Help is appreciated.

Thanks[/quote]
I actually had no idea no one knew how to add drops,ill post a tut on it so watch out for it.
EDIT-Its been posted already.Just search tut section for “drops” and youll see it.I dont have time to post here.
